name: File Digitalization
desc: A secure OCR-based document system with smart search, encrypted storage, async tasks (Celery), caching (Redis), and role-based access (JWT).

name: Save2Serve (Food Donation System)
desc: Full Stack Waste food donation platform with real-time tracking, role-based access, and interactive maps. Used KNN for need prediction and Dijkstra for optimal delivery routing.

name: Multi-Module Store & E-commerce System
desc: E-commerce platform with store builder, secure payments (Stripe/PayPal). Used Redis, Celery, Firebase, and JWT for performance, async tasks, alerts, and access control.

name: HandiQ : Local Service Finder Platform:
desc: Built a Full Stack Django-based web app connecting users to nearby service providers using Dijkstra's Algorithm, with features like booking, payments, reviews, and role-based access.

name: Hospital Management System
desc: Built with Django and REST Framework, this system streamlines patient management, appointments, medical records, and staff for doctors, nurses, and admins.

name: Event Promotion
desc: Implemented APIs with Djoser authentication, role-based access for approved organizers to create events, and multi-channel event notifications.
